message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond this price point. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is a fair price considering the value it brings.  Could you meet me halfway at $10,750?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still believe that $9,500 is a reasonable price for the product. I hope we can reach a compromise.
